scripts.sync: npm run sync-vw && npm run sync-seat
scripts.sync-vw: cd ../ && rm -rf ./com.we-volkswagen.connect && cp -R ./com.vag.core ./com.we-volkswagen.connect && cd ./com.we-volkswagen.connect && rm -rf .git .gitignore && git clone https://github.com/martijnpoppen/com.we-volkswagen.connect.git ./clone && cp -R ./clone/ . && npm ci && rm -rf clone drivers/audi-ev drivers/audi-fuel drivers/audi-hybrid drivers/skoda-ev drivers/skoda-fuel drivers/skoda-hybrid drivers/seat-ev drivers/seat-fuel drivers/seat-hybrid  && cd ..;
scripts.sync-seat: cd ../ && rm -rf ./com.seat.connectedcar && cp -R ./com.vag.core ./com.seat.connectedcar && cd ./com.seat.connectedcar && rm -rf .git .gitignore && git clone https://github.com/martijnpoppen/com.seat.connectedcar.git ./clone && cp -R ./clone/ . && npm ci && rm -rf clone drivers/audi-ev drivers/audi-fuel drivers/audi-hybrid drivers/skoda-ev drivers/skoda-fuel drivers/skoda-hybrid drivers/vw-ev drivers/vw-fuel drivers/vw-hybrid  && cd ..;
